description: This dipping dish is bursting with full flavours and spicy notes.
name: Authentic Hainanese Chicken with Garlic & Chilli Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium chicken breasts, skin and bone removed
2.4 cups chicken stock, keep 0.4 cup (100ml) aside for the dips
5 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 500ml of chicken stock up in a large saucepan to the boil and cook the chicken breasts in the stock for 20 minutes or until fully cooked.
Cook the rice as per pack instructions.
In a pot on a medium heat, heat up 50ml of chicken stock with the chilli dip ingredients and cook for 6 minutes and then pour into a serving bowl.
Now add another 50ml of chicken stock to the pot and add all the garlic dip ingredients and cook for 6 minutes before adding to another serving dish.
Once the chicken is cooked, serve sliced with rice on the side and 2 dipping sauces.
